channel.title: SkyLearn RSS Test C – Mixed Property, Sports & Entertainment Feed
channel.description: Feed designed to test Zap Filter keyword logic across property, sport, and entertainment topics

item.title: Deloitte relocates UK headquarters to Bishopsgate Tower
item.description: The firm is moving 4,000 staff into 22 Bishopsgate as part of a major consolidation of London offices.

item.title: WeWork signs new lease for flexible workspace in Shoreditch
item.description: The deal covers 55,000 sq ft across four floors, providing hybrid workspace options for tech tenants.

item.title: Landsec begins construction of £500m mixed-use scheme in Southbank
item.description: The development will deliver offices, retail and life sciences labs over 1.2m sq ft by 2028.

item.title: Arsenal signs new striker from Serie A in £60m transfer deal
item.description: The 24-year-old forward joins the Gunners on a five-year contract after a successful season in Italy.

item.title: Taylor Swift buys £12m London townhouse in Notting Hill
item.description: The global superstar is said to be relocating part-time to the UK ahead of her European tour.

item.title: Drake announces new album 'Views from the Thames'
item.description: The rapper teased the project, reportedly inspired by London’s nightlife and recent collaborations with UK artists.

item.title: Brookfield acquires logistics park in Milton Keynes
item.description: The acquisition adds 400,000 sq ft of warehouse space to its UK industrial portfolio.

item.title: Apple unveils Vision Pro 2 headset with expanded app ecosystem
item.description: The device introduces new mixed reality modes and improved battery life for developers.

item.title: Amazon expands European HQ campus in Dublin with new data centre
item.description: The new 80MW facility will support low-latency cloud operations and create 300 new jobs.

item.title: Manchester United submits plans for Old Trafford redevelopment
item.description: The proposed scheme includes expanded seating, upgraded hospitality suites and a new fan zone.

item.title: Rihanna launches new fashion line in collaboration with Harrods
item.description: The luxury partnership introduces sustainable fabrics and a London pop-up launch event.

item.title: Derwent London refurbishes Fitzrovia office block for creative tenants
item.description: The retrofit adds terraces and improves energy performance to meet 2030 carbon targets.

item.title: Weekly property digest: top office lettings and development updates
item.description: This week’s roundup features leasing activity across London, Manchester and Bristol.
